Description:
Detects possible Java payloads in web access logs

Author: frack113, Harjot Singh, "@cyb3rjy0t" (update)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Java Payload Strings
Query: eql select * from _source_ where (log like '%%24%7b%28%23a%3d%40%' or log like '%${(#a=@%' or log like '%%24%7b%40java%' or log like '%${@java%' or log like '%u0022java%' or log like '%%2f%24%7b%23%' or log like '%/${#%' or log like '%new+java.%' or log like '%getruntime().exec(%' or log like '%getruntime%28%29.exec%28%')
